name: fatigue

fatigue noun
(TIREDNESS/WEAKNESS)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ U ] formal extreme tiredness: suffer from fatigue She was suffering from fatigue.
[ U ]
  engineering
  specialized weakness in something, such as a metal part or structure, often caused by repeated bending: metal fatigue The crash was caused by metal fatigue in one of the propeller blades. See also
compassion fatigue

fatigue noun
(ARMY)
fatigues [ plural ]
  military
  specialized
a loose, brownish-green uniform worn by soldiers: army fatigues Groups of young men in army fatigues carried equipment along the road.
UK work such as cleaning or cooking, done by soldiers, often as punishment: on fatigues Get dressed right now or you'll find yourself on fatigues.
See more
to make someone extremely tired: The journey had fatigued him.
